CustomField.description: SFE-46 - Checkbox is updated by workflows by counting Inbound + Outbound Email services. This is to notify agents that the customer has responded to the last agent's email.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This notification flags that the customer has responded to the last email sent by the agent. This may be helpful to see quickly that an existing case may have had a response.
CustomField.label: Apex Cust Replied Since Last Interaction
